_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/container_counts` for this object.

forty_ft_hc.description: Quantity of 40 ft HC containers requested.

forty_five_ft_hc.description: Quantity of 45 ft HC containers requested.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/product_descriptions` for this object.

description.description: Always required. English description of product in booking.

description_for_export_customs.description: Required if booking if origin address or origin port is in Mainland China. Chinese description of product in booking.

description_for_export_customs_locale.description: Required if booking if origin address or origin port is in Mainland China. Code for the locale for description_for_export_customs. Currently only `zh_CN`.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/hs_code` for this object.

description.description: Description of HS or HTS code classification.

code.description: 6 digit (international HS) or 10 digit (US HTS) code.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/product_descriptions` for this object.

description.description: Always required. English description of product in booking.

description_for_export_customs.description: Required if booking if origin address or origin port is in Mainland China. Chinese description of product in booking.

description_for_export_customs_locale.description: Required if booking if origin address or origin port is in Mainland China. Code for the locale for description_for_export_customs. Currently only `zh_CN`.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/hs_code` for this object.

description.description: Description of HS or HTS code classification.

code.description: 6 digit (international HS) or 10 digit (US HTS) code.

wants_export_customs_service.description: Determines if the booking requires Flexport to provide export customs services.

wants_import_customs_service.description: Determines if the booking requires Flexport to provide import customs services.

cargo.description: With cargo you have two options, detailed or simple. These are both expressed directly on the cargo object. For detailed cargo, `shipping_units` is required, and `weight` and `volume` is required in the `cargo` object or the `shipping_units` object. For simple cargo, `shipping_units` is required, but only one should be specified, and `weight` and `volume` are required in the `cargo` object.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/cargo` for this object.

unit.description: unit of measurement. "cbm" for cubic meters. "cbft" for cubic feet.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/quantity/weight` for this object.

value.description: Required. Specifies the weight as a float.

unit.description: Required. Unit of measurement. "kg" for kilograms and "lbs" for pounds.

marks_and_numbers.description: Optional. Identifying markings and numbers that are visible on the cargo.

items.description: For detailed cargo, `shipping_units` is required. For simple cargo, `shipping_units` is required, but only one should be specified.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/shipping_unit` for this object.

name.description: Optional. Name of the unit of cargo.

unit.description: unit of measurement. "cbm" for cubic meters. "cbft" for cubic feet.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/quantity/weight` for this object.

value.description: Required. Specifies the weight as a float.

unit.description: Required. Unit of measurement. "kg" for kilograms and "lbs" for pounds.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/quantity/length` for this object.

value.description: Required. Specifies the length as a float.

unit.description: Required. Unit of measurement. "cm" for centimeters. "in" for inches.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/quantity/length` for this object.

value.description: Required. Specifies the length as a float.

unit.description: Required. Unit of measurement. "cm" for centimeters. "in" for inches.

_object.description: String representing the object’s type. Always `/quantity/length` for this object.

value.description: Required. Specifies the length as a float.

unit.description: Required. Unit of measurement. "cm" for centimeters. "in" for inches.

count.description: Required. Total number of this shipping unit.

atomic_count.description: Required if `unit_type` = `pallet`. The number of atomic units, i.e. units that will not be unpacked and broken up during shipping, contained in each shipping unit.

unit_type.description: Required. Packing method of the shipping. This can be `bag`, `bale`, `barrel`, `carton`, `crate`, `package`, `pallet`, or `roll`.

contains_hazmat.description: Required. Whether the cargo contains hazardous materials.

contains_magnets.description: Required. Whether the cargo contains magnets.

contains_other_dangerous_goods.description: Required. Whether the cargo contains other non-hazmat, non-magnet, non-battery dangerous goods.

contains_li_ion.description: Required. Whether the cargo contains lithium-ion batteries.

contains_non_li_ion_battery.description: Required. Whether the cargo contains non-lithium-ion batteries, e.g. lithium batteries.

lithium_batteries_packing_types.description: Required if `contains_li_ion` is `true`. List of ways in which lithium-ion batteries will be packed for this booking. This can be a subset of `packed_loose`, `packed_with_equipment`, `contained_in_equipment`, and `contained_in_battery_powered_vehicle`.

special_instructions.example: This message is written in invisible ink.

ref_type.description: Type of the object in this list.

link.description: URL to fetch list of objects.

metadata.description: Set of custom key-values specific to the object. The keys are strings and values are arrays of strings. The set of valid keys is always the consignee's list of keys, even if call was made by a different party.

default.name: PO 12345
default.special_instructions: This message is written in invisible ink.
